name: Just Another Slender Clone
description:
Your Car Has a Flat Tire...

Well, all 4 them are flat. What are the odds of that?

Lucky for you, there are 4 brand new tires throughout the nearby forest. How do you know that? Don't ask questions!

But beware, tales of a tall, pale, and slender man linger around the towns nearby. Can you get all the tires in time to get home?

Or will you suffer the same fate as those before you?

Note: this is my first *actual* game made / released, so keep that in mind when playing. I wanted to make something small, so I decided to remake an old classic that I used to love when I was a kid. The game that got me into wanting to develop games.
